title: Frequently Asked Questions
q1.question: Q: What is Lorem Ipsum?
q1.answer: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
q2.question: Q: Why do we use it?
q2.answer: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
q3.question: Q: Where can I get some?
q3.answer1: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration.
